TopicTitle: Apocalypse in an hour or asteroid space station

Articles.Content:
the situation is grim, i know, about an hour to impact of an E class asteroid, and Kerbins final hope is a little engine with an edited kw engine to use barely any fuel at all, yet still only has like 1800 m/s of delta v.

so this asteroid wants war

ILL GIVE IT WAR ALRIGHT!

there is only three ways this can end, either this asteroid hits the ground and destroys kerbin, it misses kerbin entirely, or I conquer this little **** and pull it into orbit, there is no other option.

Edited April 7, 2014 by Deadpangod3

Also really scary how unprepared we are in real life.

Good luck
